Text.Page:
! I've got some interesting news!

Those red crabbers and red crabbombs over there have been eating the crystallized Mournwings. After that, the Thorny eyestalkers ate the Red Crabbers!

This could mean that the Thorny eyestalkers developed an immune system against the Mournwings by eating the crabbers.

Please collect their shells for me.

I can't wait to see what kind of interrelation the crabbers and eyestalkers have.

Thank you for your help, . Now all that's left is rescuing Titus and the villagers. I wish you luck!
Without enough samples, I can't continue my research.
